ComicInfo.Summary:
The climactic final issue! Devastated after last issue's events, Nate is faced with a dire decision: Us or Them. Will he choose to save The Mainstream? Or will he save a reality where his birth mother is still alive?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Talent Caldwell | 1 | B | Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Talent Caldwell | Missing |
